name: fetch-gifs
description: Easily Search throught gifs based on search term

scripts.build: rimraf -rf build && babel src -d build && ./src2build.sh && npm run minify
scripts.minify: cd build && minify g* --output giphy.js && minify i* --output index.js && minify r* --output riffsy.js

author: Ademola Adegbuyi <marhyorh@gmail.com>
